summary: Provides utilities for managing Docker containers and images, including building images from uploaded sources, pulling images from Docker Hub, verifying architecture compatibility, and restarting containers. It uses asynchronous Docker APIs, retry logic, and integrates with FastAPI error handling.
business_intent: Allow the platform to automatically build, retrieve, and control Dockerized application instances for users, ensuring that required images are available and containers are running reliably in both cloud and onâ€‘premise deployments.
